import React from "react"; import "./style.css"; import { Helmet, HelmetProvider } from "react-helmet-async"; import Typewriter from "typewriter-effect"; import { introdata, meta } from "../../content_option"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import img from '../../../src/images/profilepic.jpeg'; import resume from '../../../src/Resume/Chakradhar_Grandhi_Resume.pdf'; export const Home = () => { return (
{meta.title}

{introdata.title}

{introdata.description}

Resume
Contact Me
); };
